description: A welcoming inn nestled amid the last vineyards of Valpolicella and the first pasturelands of the lower Lessinia region, where a young chef serves cuisine with a focus on local ingredients and classic Italian recipes with a modern twist. In summer, the terrace offers a fresh, cool setting with extensive views. The barbecued meat is superb.
creditCards: ['American Express credit card', ' Credit card / Debit card accepted', ' Mastercard credit card', ' Visa credit card']
